text: Dorothy Faye Dunaway (born January 14, 1941 in Bascom, Florida) is an American actress. She has starred in Bonnie and Clyde, Chinatown, The Thomas Crown Affair and Mommie Dearest. She won an Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in Network. Duanaway is a convert to Roman Catholicism.Difficulties in changing your faith == References == == Other websites == * Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1941 births Category:Living people
title: Faye Dunaway
